programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep70
programme.desc: The Scarlet Panther - When the feared Scarlet Panther comes to town, Puss is forced to give up his boots and must wear laid-back slippers which change his personality

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep69
programme.desc: Dr Webby - Bumble's sneezing has got so bad, it is keeping everyone awake at night. Webby gives Fifi a recipe for a cure for sneezes will it work?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep70
programme.desc: Make Room For Fifi - There is a horrid smell in Fifi's garden. Fifi goes to stay with Primrose and Violet while they try and work out where the smell is coming from. What could be causing it?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep71
programme.desc: Slugsy's Song - Slugsy has found something really special. Only Primrose can be persuaded to go and see it with him. Even she is surprised by what she sees!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep72
programme.desc: Stingo's Bridge - Webby has told Pip the story of the 3 Billy Goats Gruff. Soon a troll takes up residence under the bridge in the garden and demands food payment every time the tots cross. Can Fifi get to the bottom of the mystery?

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep17
programme.desc: When Will The Water Come Back? - Jess is concerned that all the water on the farm is frozen and sets about working out when it will come back. He works out that once the sun is out the ice melts and learns all about freezing and melting..

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep18
programme.desc: How Can We Paint The Lilly Pad Green? - Mimi is trying to prepare for a visit from Horace and wants the hutch to feel like home for her froggy friend. Jess promises to paint the special seat Mimi has made for Horace green for her, but first he has to work out how to make green from different colours.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep19
programme.desc: Where's My Feather Gone? - Jess thinks that Little Bird has dropped a feather as a gift for him to keep and play with so he's very worried when it goes missing. He searches for it and finally he finds it, right in Little Bird's nest, keeping her warm.

programme.title: Guess with Jess Ep20
programme.desc: Where Have All The Stars Gone? - Jess is having a sleepover and wants to wish on a star with the puppies like Willow has told them to. But they all fall asleep. When he wakes in the morning to find the stars are gone he has to work out why and when they'll be back

programme.title: Olivia Ep27
programme.desc: Olivia The Nature Photographer - After snapping some great photos of her cat Edwin, Olivia thinks she's ready to photograph some real wild animals. She and Julian camp out in the backyard to wait for some, and sure enough they track down a mysterious animal in the bushes. But is it really a wild beast?

programme.title: Olivia Ep28
programme.desc: The Two Olivias - There's a new girl in Olivia's class and her name is...Olivia! Confusion ensues, and Olivia (the original Olivia) can't believe that she shares her name with another person. After a brief stint calling herself Pam, Olivia eventually decides that a two Olivia town might not be so bad after all.

programme.title: Olivia Ep29
programme.desc: Olivia's Day At The Office - When Father takes Olivia and Ian to bring your kids to work day, Olivia is looking forward to a fun day with dad at the office. But when Father is given a new deadline for a big project, Olivia hatches a plan to help him out. First, however they have to track down Ian's missing frog.

programme.title: Olivia Ep30
programme.desc: Olivia Helps Mother Nature - After learning about the environment, Olivia is on a mission to recycle, cut down on waste, and conserve energy. But she just can't get Ian to turn off his light at night. Either she'll have to find a way for Ian to fall asleep without it, or else find a sustainable alternative

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep17
programme.desc: Why Crocodile Has A Bumpy Back - You see there was a time when Crocodile didn't have a bumpy back. His skin was all smooth and he had to be very careful of the hot Tinga Tinga sun. One day whilst napping Crocodile gets very sunburnt and falls into a deep sleep. Lion warns all the animals to be on their guard as the Wildebeest have returned to Tinga Tinga and they could stampede at any moment. Crocodile misses the meeting, snoring under the hot sun. The animals try to warn snappy Crocodile but it's too late and the Wildebeest stampede! OOOoof! . All over Crocodile. From that day on Crocodile has a bumpy back and is grumpier and snappier than ever! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep18
programme.desc: Why Jackal Howls At The Moon - You see there was a time when Jackal didn't howl at the moon. He was a trickster and he always wanted what was not rightfully his. Jackal took over Hen's nest and Aardvark's burrow. He even took the cub's supper from Mama Cheetah! Enough was enough! All the animals decide to teach Jackal a lesson and make him believe that the Moon is made of the sweetest, most delicious honey in Tinga Tinga. Of course, Jackal instantly wants some but it never comes. From that day on Jackal howls up at the moon, waiting for another drop of delicious MOOoooon honey! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep19
programme.desc: Why Hare Hops - You see there was a time when Hare didn't hop. He was one of the speediest animals in Tinga Tinga but none of the other animals wanted to race with him because Hare always won and it was becoming boring. Then one day, slow but clever Tortoise decides to challenge Hare. Hare can't believe his luck, but Tortoise wins and he wins and he wins! When Hare realizes that it's not such fun being on the losing end, Tortoise finally lets Hare hop past the finishing line in first place! Well it's not good to win all the time. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep20
programme.desc: Why Mosquito Buzzes - You see there was time when Mosquito didn't buzz. Mosquito was as quiet as quiet can be and did she like to tell tales. One day Mosquito tells the Monkeys that the sun looks very low in the sky. Maybe it's sad and doesn't want to rise!' worry the Monkeys. Mosquito flits off to spread the news - The sun is never going to rise again!' soon the whole of Tinga Tinga is in complete panic The Sun is never going to rise again!' Of course, the sun does rise again and all is right again in Tinga Tinga. But the animals decide to tie a grass around Mosquito's tail. From that day on Mosquito buzzes and everyone can swot her away rather than listen to her gossipy tales. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep37
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Ludicrous Lunacy of the Loopy Laserlightmare - Despite being terrible at the job, Krupp wants to be the camp director again next summer. That's something Harold and George simply cannot abide.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep38
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shocking Showdown of the Staggering Sugamechangere - It's parents' weekend at Lake Summer Camp, and Krupp's eager to make amends with Harold and George ... or so he says.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep31
programme.desc: Lights, Camera, Org Chart! - Boss Baby creates an org chart to cement his leadership as the Boss of the playgroup babies. However when Bubbeezee photographer Travis Le Duque chooses anyone but Boss for his coverspread;the status quo is upended! Tim continues to fail his class assignment: a model solar system

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep32
programme.desc: The Big Break - Boss thought that breaking his arm was painful;but the true pain starts at pediatrician Dr. Kevins jokes. Boss enlists the playgroup babies to defang the doctor of his comedians disease. Tim obsesses about keeping his little brother safe.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep6
programme.desc: The Lost City - With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep25
programme.desc: Peril Patch / Sibling Quibbling - When a mysterious, dangerous mini-golf course blooms in Troll Village, the Trolls must figure out how to destroy it/Satin's relationship with Chenille is tested when she befriends an extreme sports-loving Troll

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep77
programme.desc: The End Is Near - When King Julien learns that Clover may marry Sage, he sets out to prepare the kingdom for post-Clover attacks

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep11
programme.desc: Hit or Myth in Greece - When Odlulu uses the Greek Myth Key to bring Greek myth to life and capture the Golden Fleece, the Wanderers embark on a legendary quest to restore order in modern Athens. With the help of Jason (of Argonaut fame) the Wanderers build a "Trojan Fritz" to help get past the Cyclops.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep6
programme.desc: A Ball-For-All - It's Ball-entines Day, the day when the dogs of Pawston show their affection for each other by exchanging balls. But unfortunately, the town is fresh out, so Tag and Scooch set sail for Ball Island. \ If Tag and Scooch want to leave Ball Island with the balls they chose for their family, they must earn them by proving themselves ball-worthy, through a series of challenges from The Fetcher.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep18
programme.desc: The Big Sleep-Walk / Of Course You Can - When Ian starts to sleepwalk around Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly guides him back to his own bed where he can continue sleeping safely. / When Felicia wants to run an obstacle course for the first time but is afraid shell embarrass herself, TZG secretly boosts her confidence by helping with practice.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep25
programme.desc: Belly Flop - The Riders have to save Elbone when he's swallowed by a giant Sea Gronckle, and Dak's awful cooking might be just the thing to do it.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep49
programme.desc: The Case Of The Diabolo - Noddy's delighted to be given a diabolo by Big Ears. But when Noddy tries it out for the first time, the diabolo crashes and breaks in two. Even worse, when Noddy goes to retrieve the two halves, he finds that they're both missing! Noddy needs to investigate. Where is his new toy?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep50
programme.desc: The Case Of The Vanished Trophy - Queen Sparklewings invites the toys to play a game of Catch the Flag at the castle. But when the special trophy goes missing, Noddy has to investigate. Where is the vanished trophy?

programme.title: Archibald's Next Big Thing Is Here! Ep29
programme.desc: The Fluffberg Method / Singing Tele-Grammers - When Dr. Fluffberg is outed as not being a real doctor, Archibald must help him through medical school where students are put through the trials of a simulated hospital. / Archibald dons the mantle of a singing telegrammer but runs into trouble when he loses the official Grammer songbook.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep52
programme.desc: This Is An End Part 1 & 2 - With a big meteorite headed straight for Ahhh! Valley, Grug gathers a team to try and stop the rock before it destroys the valley while Ugga takes the rest of the family to go do the one thing they've always wanted to do in Ahhh! Valley before they evacuate

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep51
programme.desc: Harvily Ever After / Let It Zo - Lucretia's wrapping up her Harvey Girls fan fiction podcast, but it's hard to say goodbye. Zoe's convinced that Audrey stole her bananarama baton.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep51
programme.desc: Turbo Does Laundry Part 1/Part 2 - An exciting two-part episode of connected mini-stories following the crew that ends with Silent But Deadly and Thora deactivating a stink bomb.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Squishy Predicament of Stanley Peet's Stinky Pits - When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Costly Conundrum of the Calamitous Claylossus - George and Harold transform the school's mysterious student into a giant clay monster who turns the entire town into clay

programme.desc: Glamping / A Flower for Poppy - Branch is excited to take the Troll children camping with him. programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep38

programme.desc: Boom Baby - Looking to trim costs, Boss unknowingly fires Boom Baby, a super-undercover Baby Corp worker who displays to parents how unsafe things are by pratfalling on them and crying for attention. programme.desc: Violet's Flower Festival - Violet is organising a flower festival. She is so busy helping the other tots with their blooms she has neglected hers. Will her flower open in time for the big day?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep74
programme.desc: Pumpkin Pie For Diggly - Diggly is bored of the same old scraps every day. Fifi and Bumble decide to make him a pumpkin pie as a surprise. But there's no flour left to make the pastry, what will they use instead?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep75
programme.desc: Rockabye Stingo - Fifi has lost Cottonsocks, her beloved toy rabbit. She searches the garden for it to no avail. But that couldn't be Stingo cuddling it could it?

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep76

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep146
programme.desc: At the Beach - Peppa and her family go to the beach, and they do lots of things there including burying Daddy Pig in the sand. When it's time to go they almost leave without Daddy Pig as he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep148
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Boat - Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Shopping - Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep148
programme.desc: An Endless Story - Anna is reading Christopher and Froga a story - but when she gets to the end, they discover the last two pages are missing! After a search for the missing pages, they find out that one of them is blank.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Apple Picking - The apples on the apple tree are ripe and the friends are super excited to go to pick them! They will make puree, juice, tarts, but also eat them straight! But the tree has grown since last year and the apples are hard to reach...

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S04 Ep406
programme.desc: Knights of the Snack Table - Sir Joshalot and the Knights of the Snack Table are on an epic quest through the neighborhood to find a special treat for the afternoon snack feast! Throughout their journey, the knights demonstrate the most knightly of qualities-helping others.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Pups Get Skunked / Pups and a Whale of a Tale - When Everest gets sprayed by a skunk, the pups delicately try to tell her she needs a bath! // The pups put a new spin on freeze tag after they fly far north to help free a baby whale thats trapped under the ice.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Pups Save a City Kitty - Cali gets lost in the woods.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Deer Squad S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Raining teddies / Party people - Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest! // Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Paddington Finds a Hobby / Paddington and the Stamp - Paddington does not have a hobby like all of the Browns, but Mrs. Brown finds out what Paddington is good at. // Paddington gets his arm stuck in a post box after accidentally using Mr. Gruber's rare Penny Black stamp on his letter to Aunt Lucy.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: S'Mores - Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep613
programme.desc: Pups Save a Freaky Pup-Day / Pups Save a Runaway Mayor - Chase and Chickaletta switch bodies and must learn to work together to return Cap'n Turbot's boat to the bay. // Mayor Humdinger creates robotic Pants to cheat at the Most Amazing Athlete Contest. They go haywire so Pups have to save runaway Mayor.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S06 Ep616
programme.desc: Pups Save the Balloon Pups / Pups Save the Spider Spies - Giant balloons floated away from a parade and it's up to the pups to save the pup balloons, the parade and Mayor Humdinger! // The Turbot cousins try to spot a rare spider, but get stuck in its web. It's up to the PAW Patrol save the spider spies!

programme.title: Bossy Bear S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Ultimate Hype Bear / The Chrysalis Crew / Just Say No - Bissy is meeting her favorite band, but Bossy tags along. // Bossy and Turtle find a chrysalis. // Turtle has trouble telling his friends no.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep203
programme.desc: The Secret Password / Monday Funday - The fishy friends find themselves locked out when they can't remember the secret password to get inside their clubhouse. // The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S02 Ep210
programme.desc: Shark House Rock / Toothpaste Tumble - Baby Shark helps Mommy find the perfect musical instrument to play in their family band. // Daddy is embarrassed after Grandpa and Baby post a funny video of him on ChewTube.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Finceaera - Lorelai is conflicted when invited to her older sister's birthday party because she's never felt she belonged in Merlandia. When Escarlata threatens to take over, Lorelai must accept her uniqueness as a strength or risk losing everything she loves.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Night of the Turtles - When Bonnie kidnaps newly-hatched turtles before they can swim to momma out at sea, Santi and crew are on the move.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep150
programme.desc: My Birthday Party - It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Picnic - Peppa and her family go for a picnic. Daddy Pig falls asleep after eating so much, but then gets some exercise being chased by a wasp!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep151
programme.desc: Daddy's Movie Camera - Daddy gets a new video camera. First, Peppa shows him how to work it, and then he records Peppa being silly.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep152
programme.desc: School Play - Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Polly's Holiday - Granny and Grandpas pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Windy Autumn Day - It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppas ball blows into the pond and Georges hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Greedyguts / Where is Bali? - A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep603
programme.desc: Dino Derby - Today, dinosaur Blaze is teaming up with his prehistoric pal Zeg to compete in... the Dino Derby! But will this dino duo have what it takes to outrace the rest and become Dino Derby champions?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Sir Blaze and the Unicorn - Witness the return of Sir Blaze and Sir AJ as they embark on an epic quest to free a magical unicorn from an unpoppable bubble!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep314

programme.desc: Inside and Outside - Kit and Pup are playing with a cardboard box. Can you see who is playing inside and who is playing outside the box? Kit and Pup are also helping a little investigator fit all of her toys inside a suitcase.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S5 Ep8
programme.desc: Spider - Dee encourages a friend to say 'spider' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different spiders!

programme.desc: Spinning - The Teletubbies travel by Tubby Car to the Hidey Hup where they all spin around on the Tubby Spinny.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Hello, Hello (Eh-Oh!) - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and say "Hello".

programme.title: Clangers S2 Ep21

programme.desc: The Thing That Was At the End of The World - Gwen and Bob embark on an epic trek to find what is at the end of the world.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep48

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep49

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep52

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep53

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep54

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep47

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep12

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S15 Ep12

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep2

programme.title: My World Kitchen S3 Ep8

programme.desc: Trend Game / This Bird Has Flown - When Ronnie Anne realizes that she's not up to date on all of the latest trends, she seeks help from Carlota. // Bobby struggles to find Sergio after wishing he would fly away and never come back.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep305
programme.desc: For the Record - Worried he's not keeping up with his cool friends, Sameer tries to break a record for some street cred.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep216
programme.desc: Cave Dwelling Sponge / The Clam Whisperer - When a prehistoric Sponge is unfrozen, he causes chaos all over town - and only SpongeBob can communicate with him! // When a flock of clams descend on Bikini Bottom, SpongeBob has to get them out before they ruin the whole town!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep111

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Pearl Wants to Be a Star / Super Sitters - Pearl stars in a guest appearance on The Patrick Show. // Patrick and SpongeBob go back in time to watch Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy when they were new.

programme.desc: Tiny Toddler / Magical Beefery Tour - After misplacing the shrink ray Captain Man & Kid Danger have to battle The Toddler to win it back. // When Captain Man & Kid Danger find a golden pickle in their burger they win a private tour of the secretive factory where Beefo's Burgers are made.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Wahoo Punch Bro / Pink Rocket - When the Wahoo Punch Bro is running amok through Swellview, Captain Man & Kid Danger must find a way to stop him. // When Mitch Bilsky mocks Henry's kiddie motor scooter, Ray sets up race between Henry & Mitch to prove whose transportation is faster.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep222
programme.desc: Krabby Patty Creature Feature / Teacher's Pests - A new secret Krabby Patty formula has disastrous results for Bikini Bottom, and only SpongeBob can save the day. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBob's there to show them the ropes!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep236
programme.desc: Call the Cops! - Plankton goes to jail, but the secret formula is taken as evidence! SpongeBob and Mr. Krabs plot to get it back.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep504
programme.desc: Taken / The Flying Beast - The boy's imaginations run wild when Dave disappears. When they finally find him, they're convinced he's a zombie. // Alvin tries to convince Dave that he's being hunted by a flying beast.

programme.desc: The Curse of MacBeth / Zeela The Great - The Chipmunks don't want to perform in the school play, after learning of its curse. // Simon's robot Geizmo becomes jealous of Jeanette's robot Zeela, until a sudden tragedy reveals Geizmo's true heart.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Texas Weiners / YooHooTube - Captain Man & Kid Danger are tasked with driving to pick up 1,000 hot dogs for a birthday party. // To save Schwoz from an experiment gone wrong, Captain Man & Kid Danger must follow instructions he posted online, but first they need decent wifi.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S02 Ep225
programme.desc: The Invasion Part 1 - Leo and Donnie disagree about their plan to stop the Kraang invasion. When Leo makes a critical mistake, he is separated from the team and Donnie must step up as a leader.

programme.desc: Bad Heir Day / Freaks and Greeks - Crocker wants an heir to his supposed 'fortune and fame'. Poof coincidentally ends up in his care and Crocker is set for life. // Timmy destroys Mt. Olympus and now all the Greek gods pay him a visit seeking revenge.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mapmaker, Mapmaker, Make Me A Map - In need of a unique custom map for their next quest, Brendar and the group attempt to wine and dine the only map maker in Gothmoria capable of creating the map they need.

programme.desc: Dorg Gets a Pimple / Dorg the Dorgnificent - Desperate for a good yearbook photo, Dorg asks Patronella to magically remove the pimple on his chin. // When Dorg tries casting a spell at his sister's birthday party and Patronella turns into a tiger, he learns that magic really does take patience.

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Gone With The Wand / Fountain of Too Much Youth - Felicity and friends find a magic wand, which they use to make crazy wishes until they can locate the wand's rightful owner. // When Miguel discovers his favorite malt is now on the kids menu, he drinks from The Fountain of Youth to get younger.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep107

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep109

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep113

programme.title: Wallykazam! S01 Ep124
programme.desc: The Big Goblin Problem Part 1 - Wally's Uncle Steve the Skydasher visits, with magic bubbles that double what they pop on. When Bobgoblin doubles himself over and over, Wally must stop the Bobgoblins from taking over town.

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Snack Attack / The Backward Bug - Bug Felicity discovers her favorite snack has been sabotaged so she takes matters into her own hands by visiting the Snacktory. // The Backwards Bug bites Miguel and Athena, causing them to speak backwards until their friends can find the cure.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep228
programme.desc: Fun-Sized Friends / Grandmum's the Word - SpongeBob and Patrick exchange tiny living versions of themselves. It's a whole hunk of homunculus fun! // Plankton tells his Grandma that he owns the Krusty Krab, but must keep the lie going when she comes to visit.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231
programme.desc: My Leg! / Ink Lemonade - Now that Fred's leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harm's way...no matter what! // Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232
programme.desc: Mustard O' Mine / Shopping List - When The Krusty Krab runs out of mustard, Mr. Krabs sends SpongeBob, Patrick and Squidward to dig up some more! // SpongeBob and Sandy have to collect Krabby Patty ingredients, but Plankton is following their every step.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep514

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep514
programme.desc: Trophy Dad - The Chipmunks don't know what to do when they suspect Dave is lying about the various awards he's won.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S05 Ep515

programme.desc: Jolly Lodgers / Biddy Sitting - Squidward packs his bags after his house gets infested, but a different kind of pest waits at his hotel. // SpongeBob and Patrick get tricked into babysitting a grouchy old lady, who does all she can to escape.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep254
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Big Birthday Blowout Part 1 - SpongeBob and Patrick tour the surface world, while the rest of Bikini Bottom prepares a surprise for SpongeBob!

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.desc: Collingwood welcome Fremantle to their spiritual home ground Victoria Park, for Round 2 action in the AFLW.

programme.title: AFLW Ep10
programme.desc: The North Melbourne-Tasmanian Kangaroos take on the Carlton Blues in Round 2 of the AFLW at Arden Street in Melbourne.

programme.title: Landline Ep31
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Folau Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The story of one our most gifted and controversial athletes and how a social media post landed him in the heart of our culture wars. Part 1 traces Folau's family background and his rise to the top of the Rugby world.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep73
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's top stories. Plus reporters investigating the issues that matter. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep16
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - For the first time, Back Roads leaves Australian shores and travels to our closest northern neighbour, Papua New Guinea. Guest presenter Tania Bale introduces us to Rabaul, a community with close ties to Australia. (Final)

programme.title: Our Law Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - With a crucial fitness test standing in the way of finishing their cadetship, the cadets make their final push towards graduating. The frontline police officers each make life-changing decisions.

programme.title: Australia's Vietnam War Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - 'A Popular War' shows how Australia became entangled in the war, how sending conscripted soldiers won widespread support but forever changed lives and how the first stirrings of dissent started to appear.

programme.title: Australia Remastered: Wild Treasures Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - A year in the life of Kakadu in Australia's Top End. Aaron Pedersen explains the six seasons recognised by the Bininj people and reveals the web of relationships between its species and the environment.

programme.title: Compass Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 37 - Michael Mohammed Ahmad is one of Australia's most exciting emerging writers. Founder of the Sweatshop writers' collective in Western Sydney, he's proof that the pen is mightier than the sword.

programme.title: Art Works Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Namila's at Melbourne's NGV International; singer-songwriter Jen Cloher discusses their new album; cultural objects return to lutruwita for an important new exhibition at TMAG; and a performance by slam-poet Thabani Tshuma.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep20
programme.desc: Erica Packer, former wife of billionaire James Packer, opens up about the deadly genetic mystery shadowing her family and the scientists working to crack the code for thousands more Australians.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep73
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Landline Ep31
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep73
programme.desc: The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: Insiders Ep31
programme.desc: David Speers and a panel of leading political analysts and commentators examine the political events of the week including the ASEAN Summit and G20 in India, and look ahead to the issues on the agenda as parliament resumes.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep35
programme.desc: It's Finals time in the AFL and NRL. Kelli Underwood and a panel of experts unpack all the action from the AFL Qualifying and Elimination Finals, the opening weekend of the NRL Finals, the Rugby World Cup and US Open tennis.

programme.title: Australian Story Ep20
programme.desc: Erica Packer, former wife of billionaire James Packer, opens up about the deadly genetic mystery shadowing her family and the scientists working to crack the code for thousands more Australians.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep32
programme.desc: The Reserve Bank kept interest rates on hold in July and August, after 12 rate rises since May 2022. Rachel Pupazzoni brings you the week in finance news as outgoing RBA Governor Philip Lowe chairs his final meeting on rates.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep34
programme.desc: Beverley O'Connor brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep32
programme.desc: Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Landline Ep31
programme.desc: Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: News Breakfast: Early Ep181
programme.desc: Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Michael Rowland and Lisa Millar bring you news and interviews plus Tony Armstrong with sport and Nate Byrne with weather.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep181
programme.desc: When big stories break, turn to Karina Carvalho in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep181
programme.desc: The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep23
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Sophie explains how flowers fruit, Jerry tours a bonsai collection, Millie visits a quarry restoration, Tammy builds a vertical garden, Clarence tackles tough weeds, and we meet an indoor plant expert using no soil.

programme.title: Folau Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The story of one our most gifted and controversial athletes and how a social media post landed him in the heart of our culture wars. Part 1 traces Folau's family background and his rise to the top of the Rugby world.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep161
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep181
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, the best coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to get you up to speed on what you need to know.

programme.title: The Drum Ep166
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep181
programme.desc: Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep141
programme.desc: Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep181

programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week, Masa Takumi is performing two pieces from an album that won a Grammy this year. Plus, we'll meet MANOA, a newcomer who just made her major-label debut.

programme.title: Easy Japanese For Work
programme.desc: Today: adjusting a schedule with a client. Lan Cheng, from China, works in Gunma Prefecture at a company that makes pizza ovens. He'd like to learn how to better communicate with customers.

programme.title: A Cat'S-Eye View Of Japan
programme.desc: Our first kitty-guided tour is of the scenic Lake Kussharo. Another kitty guides us around sacred spots within a village of the indigenous Ainu people.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Anime Manga Explosion
programme.desc: Discover the secrets of anime and manga in this brand-new series, starting with The Rose of Versailles! Join us as we unveil the enduring appeal of the iconic series celebrating its 50th anniversary.

programme.title: U&I
programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.title: Texico
programme.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Japan'S Top Inventions (28 Min.)
programme.desc: The fascinating stories and secrets behind hit Japanese products, plus parts and machines that boast the top share of niche markets. This time: fish finders & medical simulators.

programme.title: No Art, No Life Closer
programme.desc: Muratakun (24) draws a blueprint on the back of a poster, cuts it up, and assembles the pieces. The result is a skillfully constructed robot, with joints that move as though human.

programme.title: Pythagoraswitch Mini
programme.desc: There are hidden rules and unique ways of thinking, we can discover in our daily lives. With anime, songs, exercises, and Pythagora tools, get ready for fun! This time "The New Creature"...

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Somewhere Street A Little Stroll
programme.desc: Let's have a short walk in the street of Shanxing in China where is close to Shanghai, which is famous for canals and Shanxing wine.

programme.title: Japan Time-Lapse Ainu
programme.desc: The Ainu: indigenous people of northern Japan. Time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke investigates various aspects of their culture and traditions. This time: Ainu Houses.

programme.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from September 10, Day 1 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline In Depth
programme.desc: Introducing a colorful variety of feature stories, including reports on daily life from locations throughout Japan, as well as other parts of Asia and around the world.

programme.title: Japan From Above: Up Close
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We follow Spanish photographer Tina Bague as she captures images of fellow non-Japanese living in Miyama in Kyoto, and Ukrainian Denys Kralikauskas who makes and mends tatami mats in Beppu in Oita.

programme.title: Nun'S Cookbook
programme.desc: The temple chefs show us how to make sakubei. First, knead wheat flour and shape into thread-like bundles. Then, deep fry for a sweet treat perfect for the Tanabata star festival.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Takenami Hiroo is one of the premier makers of nebuta, the floats that are the main attraction of the Aomori Nebuta Festival. He hopes to share the unique appeal of nebuta with the world.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: As Russia's invasion of Ukraine shows no end in sight, we revisit Russians in Japan who appeared on NHK WORLD-JAPAN's Russian language radio show to ask about their thoughts and emotional struggles.

programme.title: Hello! NHK World-Japan
programme.desc: We provide emergency information for foreigners in Japan. They're served on web-site or smartphone app in various languages. We also provide an internet brochure on daily-life information in Japan.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 293: Adesanya vs. Strickland EpMainEvent
programme.desc: Back to fight down under for the first time since 2019, UFC middleweight champion Israel Adesanya will pack Quodos Bank Arena in Sydney, Australia, when he defends his crown against hungry challenger Sean Strickland in the main event of UFC 293. After regaining his title with a satisfying knockout of Alex Pereira in April, New Zealands Adesanya now sets his sights on Strickland, who has won eight of his last ten bouts on the way to the biggest fight of his career. Plus, the pride of Western Australia returns, as heavyweight knockout artist Tai Tuivasa collides with Alexander Volkov.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts EpBlackHistoryMonthHeavyweights
programme.desc: UFC Ultimate Knockouts celebrates Black History Month with a collection of the most powerful knockouts coming from the heavyweight division. See Francis Ngannou, Derrick Lewis, Curtis Blaydes, Walt Harris, and more.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep908AdesanyavsWhittaker2
programme.desc: Middleweight champion Israel The Last Stylebender Adesanya comes face to face with the man he defeated to earn the 185-pound belt, Robert The Reaper Whittaker. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their rematch at UFC 271.

programme.title: UFC The Walk EpUFC257PoiriervsMcGregor2
programme.desc: UFC The Walk gives fight fans a retrospective look back at some of the most iconic moments in combat sports history. Re-live the experience of UFC champions and challengers as they prepare for their biggest fights, and get an in-depth look at their performances inside the Octagon.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep5
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep6
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Gane vs. Spivac EpPrelims
programme.desc: The UFC returns to Accor, Arena in Paris, France on Saturday, September 2, and its bringing the nations biggest star, former interim heavyweight champion Ciryl Gane, to headline once again in the UFC Fight Night main event against surging Moldovan contender Serghei Spivac. On a quest to return to the top of the division, Gane scored a blistering third-round knockout of Tai Tuivasa in his hometown in the UFCs first visit to France in 2022, and hes looking for a repeat against Spivac, who enters this bout on a three-fight winning streak, most recently finishing Derrick Lewis in a single round
